name: Attendant (RUS)
description:
Adventure, Metroidvania, Platformer,Cyberpunk.

Lore

You are a hero who lives in the world of existing buildings, you can already forget about the word skyscrapers, they have become only a reflection of the small size of the past, as in their time they were once a reflection of the future, threateningly towering over the small buildings around, but now they are the same pitiful are born against the background of conflicts between buildings and cities. Now the houses have become larger, the world has become larger, and the profession of the Lifter has become in demand and responsible, the profession is a goal that unites whole areas of floors and makes sure that there are no problems in their connection, and as a person happens on all floors of the world, they sometimes improve what is completely unwarranted for their eyes. PP.S. mMy first projet on Construct engine. Enjoy!!!!:)))
